LanguageData.OECore.label: OE - Core
LanguageData.OECore.discoveredLetterText:
You now have the knowledge to begin your journey into Obsidia Expansion. To proceed, you’ll need specific resources:

-Syntherius and Mooncloth – Grow specialized plants to harvest them.
-Obsidian, Mythril, and Platinum – Mine these rare minerals across the world.

You can also find them as quest rewards or through trade with many factions.
LanguageData.OEConstruction.label: OE - Construction
LanguageData.OEConstruction.description: Research basics of Obsidia construction technology.
LanguageData.OEConstruction.discoveredLetterText: You can now build the Obsidia Armor Station and the Obsidia Weapon Workbench.\n\nThese are your primary facilities for crafting the powerful equipment offered by Obsidia Expansion.
LanguageData.OEBuilding.label: OE - Building
LanguageData.OEBuilding.description: Research basics of Obsidia building technology.
LanguageData.OEPower.label: OE - Power
LanguageData.OEPower.description: Research basics of Obsidia power technology.
LanguageData.OEPowerAdv.label: OE - Adv. Power
LanguageData.OEPowerAdv.description: Research advanced of Obsidia power technology.
LanguageData.OEPowerExp.label: OE - Exp. Power
LanguageData.OEPowerExp.description: Research experimental of Obsidia power technology.
LanguageData.OEFurniture.label: OE - Furniture
LanguageData.OEFurniture.description: Research basics of Obsidia furniture technology.
LanguageData.OEFarm.label: OE - Farm
LanguageData.OEFarm.description: Research basics of Obsidia farming technology.
LanguageData.OEFarmAdv.label: OE - Adv. Farm
LanguageData.OEFarmAdv.description: Research advanced of Obsidia farming technology.
LanguageData.OEFarmExp.label: OE - Exp. Farm
LanguageData.OEFarmExp.description: Research experimental of Obsidia farming technology.
LanguageData.OESynth.label: OE - Synthesis
LanguageData.OESynth.description: Research basics of Obsidia synthesis technology.
LanguageData.OESynth.discoveredLetterText:
You’ve unlocked the ability to perform advanced synthesis using Syntherius at the Obsidia Synthesis Printer.

This allows the creation of rare materials such as Empyrium, Orichalcum, Neutroamine, Synthread, Hyperweave, and even Luciferium.

Mastering synthesis is essential for obtaining high-tier resources without relying on luck or trade.
LanguageData.OESynthAdv.label: OE - Adv. Synthesis
LanguageData.OESynthAdv.description: Research advanced of Obsidia synthesis technology.
LanguageData.OEGearMod.label: OE - Modernization
LanguageData.OEGearMod.description: Research advanced of Obsidia gear modernization technology.
LanguageData.OEGearMod.discoveredLetterText: This technology enables the crafting of enhanced Obsidia gear using Modernization Kits.\n\nThese kits can be crafted at the Obsidia Armor Station and Weapon Workbench and are vital for improving your colonists' combat efficiency.
LanguageData.OEModules.label: OE - Modules
LanguageData.OEModules.description: Craft module provides the owner with various bonuses, depending on the model.
LanguageData.OEGearCross.label: OE - Cross Technologies
LanguageData.OEGearCross.description: Research Cross Technologies of Obsidia gear.
LanguageData.OMCWeapons.label: OMC - Regular Weapons
LanguageData.OMCWeapons.description: Craft regular Obsidia Military Corpus soldiers weapons.
LanguageData.OMCArmor.label: OMC - Regular Armor
LanguageData.OMCArmor.description: Craft regular Obsidia Military Corpus soldiers medium power armor.
LanguageData.OMCGearMod.label: OMC - Modified Equipment
LanguageData.OMCGearMod.description: Modification Obsidia Military Corpus officers equipment.
LanguageData.OTCWeapons.label: OTC - Regular Weapons
LanguageData.OTCWeapons.description: Craft regular Obsidia Tech Corpus mechanics weapons.
LanguageData.OTCArmor.label: OTC - Regular Armor
LanguageData.OTCArmor.description: Craft regular Obsidia Tech Corpus mechanics light power armor.
LanguageData.OTCGearMod.label: OTC - Experimental Equipment
LanguageData.OTCGearMod.description: Craft experimental Obsidia Tech Corpus engineers equipment.
LanguageData.OCCWeapons.label: OCC - Regular Weapons
LanguageData.OCCWeapons.description: Craft regular Obsidia Crusaders Corpus knights weapons.
LanguageData.OCCArmor.label: OCC - Regular Armor
LanguageData.OCCArmor.description: Craft regular Obsidia Crusaders Corpus knights medium power armor.
LanguageData.OCCGearMod.label: OCC - Reforged Equipment
LanguageData.OCCGearMod.description: Reforge Obsidia Crusaders Corpus paladins equipment.
LanguageData.OECWeapons.label: OEC - Regular Weapons
LanguageData.OECWeapons.description: Craft regular Obsidia Exalted Corpus hunters psy weapons.
LanguageData.OECArmor.label: OEC - Regular Armor
LanguageData.OECArmor.description: Craft regular Obsidia Exalted Corpus hunters light power armor.
LanguageData.OECGearMod.label: OEC - Exalted Equipment
LanguageData.OECGearMod.description: Exaltation Obsidia Exalted Corpus inquisitors equipment.
LanguageData.ODCGear.label: ODC - Core
LanguageData.ODCGear.description: Research basics of Drifter Clans technology.
LanguageData.ODCGear.discoveredLetterText: You can now craft gear designed for the Obsidia Drifter Clans, using Drifters Kits.\n\nDrifters Kits are crafted at the Obsidia Armor Station and Weapon Workbench, and open the way to a rugged, nomadic combat style.
LanguageData.ODCGearAdv.label: ODC - Emergent
LanguageData.ODCGearAdv.description: Research Emergent technology of Drifter Clans.
LanguageData.ODCGearExp.label: ODC - Apex
LanguageData.ODCGearExp.description: Research Apex technology of Drifter Clans.
LanguageData.OEMechtech.label: OE - Mechtech
LanguageData.OEMechtech.discoveredLetterText: You now have the knowledge to construct basic Mechanoids from the Obsidia Expansion.\n\nBuild them using standard Mech Gestators or Large Mech Gestators to bolster your colony’s strength.
LanguageData.OEMechtechAdv.label: OE - Adv. Mechtech
LanguageData.CACGear.label: CAC - Initiation
LanguageData.CACGear.description: Research Initiation technology of Crimson Arachna Cult.
LanguageData.CACGear.discoveredLetterText: You’ve unlocked the means to create advanced Crimson Arachna Cult gear using Cultist Kits.\n\nCraft these kits at the Obsidia Armor Station and Weapon Workbench to embrace the cult's twisted power.
LanguageData.CACGearAdv.label: CAC - Enlightenment
LanguageData.CACGearAdv.description: Research Enlightenment technology of Crimson Arachna Cult.
LanguageData.OEDefence.label: OE - Defence
LanguageData.OEDefence.description: Research basics of Obsidia defence technology.
LanguageData.OEDefence.discoveredLetterText: You’ve unlocked the ability to build powerful defensive turrets from the Obsidia Expansion.\n\nThese turrets use a universal type of ammunition – the Obsidia Ammo Kit – which must be crafted, at the Obsidia Synthesis Printer, to keep your defenses operational.
LanguageData.OEDefenceAdv.label: OE - Adv. Defence
LanguageData.OEDefenceAdv.description: Research advanced of Obsidia defence technology.
LanguageData.OEBionics.label: OE - Bionics
LanguageData.OEBionics.description: Research basics of Obsidia bionics technology.
LanguageData.OEBionics.discoveredLetterText: You now have access to advanced Obsidia Expansion bionics.\n\nUse a wide range of resources to craft them at the Obsidia Bionic Table and enhance your colonists' physical performance.
LanguageData.OEBionicsAdv.label: OE - Adv. Bionics
LanguageData.OEBionicsAdv.description: Research advanced of Obsidia bionics technology.
LanguageData.OEImplants.label: OE - Implants
LanguageData.OEImplants.description: Research basics of Obsidia implanting technology.
LanguageData.OECyberwares.label: OE - Cyberwares
LanguageData.OECyberwares.description: Research basics of Obsidia cyberwares technology.
LanguageData.OECyberwares.discoveredLetterText: You can now create Cyberwares – multi-tier implants that enhance your colonists in various ways.\n\nCraft them at the Obsidia Bionic Table. Note: To install Cyberwares, you must first install a Cyberware Interface or Cyberware AI Interface.
LanguageData.OECyberwaresAdv.label: OE - Adv. Cyberwares
LanguageData.OECyberwaresAdv.description: Research advanced of Obsidia cyberwares technology.
LanguageData.OEBioengineering.label: OE - Bioengineering
LanguageData.OEBioengineering.description: Research basics of Obsidia bioengineering technology.
LanguageData.OEBioengineering.discoveredLetterText: You’ve unlocked the power of Amalgama technology, crafted primarily using the mysterious EGO Seed.\n\nPlant an EGO Tree using an EGO Seed to grow the essential materials needed for these advanced biological enhancements.
LanguageData.OEBioengineeringAdv.label: OE - Adv. Bioengineering
LanguageData.OEBioengineeringAdv.description: Research advanced of Obsidia bioengineering technology.
LanguageData.OESGear.label: OES - The Fall
LanguageData.OESGear.description: Research advanced fragments of Obsidia Eidolons technology.
LanguageData.OESGear.discoveredLetterText: You've gained the knowledge to craft part of the ultra-tier gear from the Obsidia Empire Sins.\n\nThis requires Heroic Kits, which are obtained by dismantling Heroic-grade equipment.
LanguageData.OEContainment.label: OE - Containment
LanguageData.OEContainment.description: Research basics of Obsidia сontainment technology.
LanguageData.CACGhoulBionics.label: CAC - Ghoul Bionics
LanguageData.CACGhoulBionics.description: Research advanced of Crimson Arachna Cult ghoul's bionics technology.
LanguageData.CACSerum.label: CAC - Nano Technologies
LanguageData.CACSerum.description: Research experimental of Crimson Arachna Cult serum's technology.
LanguageData.ODCGearLeg.label: ODC - Legends
LanguageData.ODCGearLeg.description: Research technology of Drifter Clans from Legends.
LanguageData.OMGGear.label: OMG - Mercenary Grid Access
LanguageData.OMGGear.description: Research advanced fragments of Obsidia Mercenary Gangs technology.
LanguageData.OMGGear.discoveredLetterText: You can now forge heavily modified equipment favored by Obsidia Mercenary Gangs.\n\nUse Mercenaries Modernization Kits at the Obsidia Armor Station and Weapon Workbench to access this brutal and efficient arsenal.
LanguageData.OEGravtech.label: OE - Gravtech
